author: MSNBC.com
title: Biden transition team prepares to fight Covid with no help from Trump
description: As President-Elect Biden’s newly-formed Transition Covid-19 Advisory Board prepares to battle against the greatest threat to public health in a century, it does so without any assistance from the current administration. Dr. Celine Gounder is a member of Biden…
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Biden winning, Trump losing discussed by Rep. Ilhan Omar
description: Joe Biden winning the 2020 presidential election, and Donald Trump losing, are discussed by Rep. Ilhan Omar. The unity of the progressive and moderate arms of the Democratic caucus is also championed by Omar in conversation with Jonathan Capehart.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: SpaceX rocket lifts off on historic mission to International Space Station
description: NASA's SpaceX rocket launched from the Kennedy Space Center in Florida sending four astronauts to the International Space Station on a historic six-month mission.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: 2020 Polling: what went right, wrong and what needs to change for next time
description: Jason Johnson sits down with two polling experts to dissect what went right and wrong with polling in 2020, and what should and could change for the next election to ensure the data is as accurate as possible for both national and state level races.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: How comedians plan to transition to a post-Trump era
description: Comedians Dean Obeidallah and Cristela Alonzo discuss how the current Administration has transformed comedy and what happens after President Trump leaves office.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: U.S. records more than 11 million Covid-19 cases
description: The United States surpassed more than 11 million Covid-19 on Sunday, as the third wave of the virus continued its uncontrolled spread. Mika Brzezsinki has the latest details.
source.name: MSNBC

author: Steve Benen
title: Following failures, Giuliani to lead Trump's hapless legal machine
description: Team Trump has a legal problem, and it apparently thinks Rudy Giuliani is the solution. That's a hilariously bad idea.
content: It's been challenging keeping up with the many failures Donald Trump's legal team has suffered since the president's defeat. The New York Times published a rundown of each of the cases over the weeke… [+3789 chars]
source.name: MSNBC

author: Hayes Brown
title: Biden's refugee plan will make America a home again
description: Biden's pledge to raise the annual ceiling for refugees is a perfect place to start undoing some of Trump's damage.
content: President-elect Joe Biden's promise to reopen the U.S. to the world's tired, poor, huddled masses is something of a perfect intersection of his coming presidency and the past four years of President … [+9346 chars]
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Gov. Cuomo: Trump doesn't like that I stand up to him
description: Gov. Andrew Cuomo, D-NY, pushes back on Trump's comments on withholding a coronavirus vaccine from New York after Gov. Cuomo said he would have experts review a vaccine rather than simply take the word of the Trump WH.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Covid-19 vaccine candidate 94.5 percent effective, Moderna says
description: Biotech company Moderna said on Monday that early analysis from its phase 3 trial shows its Covid-19 vaccine is 94.5 percent effective at preventing the infection, offering hope of a second breakthrough in as many weeks.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Gov. Whitmer reacts to Dr Atlas tweet that Michigan should 'rise up'
description: Gov. Gretchen Whitmer, D-Mich., reacts to a tweet from White House coronavirus task force member Dr. Scott Atlas regarding new coronavirus restrictions in Michigan which urged residents to 'rise up'.
source.name: MSNBC

author: Steve Benen
title: Despite vaccine optimism, coronavirus crisis intensifies in US
description: Five months ago today, Mike Pence took a victory lap on the administration's coronavirus response. In hindsight, that was tragically unwise.
content:
Much of the world has been waiting for good news on the vaccine front, and this morning, as NBC News reported, we're starting to see some.
Biotech company Moderna said Monday that early analysis fro… [+4236 chars]
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: NYC restaurants struggle to stay afloat during pandemic
description: Restaurants nationwide are struggling due to the coronavirus pandemic, and it is projected that half of New York City's restaurants may close in the next six months due to the virus. Morning Joe looks at two Manhattan locations struggling to stay afloat.
source.name: MSNBC

author: Steve Benen
title: Trump acknowledges his election defeat, then reverses course
description: Yet another first: Trump is the first American leader to concede a presidential election by accident.
content:
Nearly two weeks after Election Day, much of the country is still waiting for Donald Trump to acknowledge, at least in some way, his defeat. Yesterday, that happened -- sort of.
President Donald Tru… [+4252 chars]
source.name: MSNBC

author: Steve Benen
title: Lying about crowd sizes, Team Trump ends how it began
description: It's hard not to appreciate the symmetry. It's as if Team Trump were trying to create matching bookends for its term.
content: In the aftermath of Election Day 2016, we saw some memorable things: a presidential victor who earned 306 electoral votes, Donald Trump lying about electoral fraud, Trump accused of engaging in unscr… [+2042 chars]
source.name: MSNBC

author: Steve Benen
title: DOJ prosecutors push back against Barr's dubious election memo
description: It's striking to see 16 career prosecutors, from across the country, collectively denounce the attorney general's post-election efforts.
content: According to the Justice Department's own policies, possible investigations into election irregularities are supposed to wait until after the voting tabulations are complete and the results have been… [+2524 chars]
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: National security adviser O’Brien promises peaceful transition of power
description: One of President Trump’s top national security officials, Robert O’Brien, acknowledged the likelihood of a Biden-Harris victory, and says there will be a “a very professional transition.”
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Vaccine chief says slowing of processes that 'save peoples' lives' is worrying amid transition delay
description: Dr. Moncef Slaoui, the chief advisor for "Operation Warp Speed," elaborates on comments he made to the Financial Times warning against disruption to vaccine development and distribution amid the transition delay. He tells Andrea Mitchell that "Our focus is to…
source.name: MSNBC

title: Trump TV may be coming soon to a dystopia near you
description: Trump's term is ending, but the fight against the extremism he stirred up is far from over.

author: Steve Benen
title: White House's Atlas sparks outcry with 'rise up' rhetoric
description: In the wake of an alleged kidnapping and assassination plot against Michigan's governor, Atlas suggested people should "rise up" against her COVID efforts.
content: Like so many states, Michigan is struggling with soaring coronavirus cases, prompting Gov. Gretchen Whitmer (D) to announce a new policy over yesterday, which includes partially shutting down restaur… [+2592 chars]
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Biden: 'It's time to reward work, not just wealth in America'
description: President-elect Joe Biden spoke after meeting with business and union leaders on economic recovery plans. Biden stressed the importance of job creation and said "it's time to reward work, not just wealth in America."
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: 'More people may die if we don't coordinate': Biden stresses importance of transition process
description: President-elect Joe Biden warned that "more people may die" if the Trump administration did not coordinate with his transition team for information on coronavirus response efforts.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Former Kentucky elections director James Young on why Americans should trust poll workers
description: In a direct rebuttal to President Trump’s claims of voter fraud, the nation's top election security agency said the 2020 election was the most secure in history. Republican and former elections director in Louisville, Ky., James Young explained why election a…
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Laurie Garrett: The public is not getting that we need to social distance
description: Foreign Policy magazine columnist Laurie Garrett expresses her shock at the way many people, including our president, are completely ignoring the harsh reality of the pandemic that has already killed nearly 250,000 Americans
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Ben Rhodes explains that the U.S. is the most vulnerable during a transition
description: Former deputy national security advisor to President Obama Ben Rhodes speaks to Nicolle Wallace about America’s unique weaknesses during a transition of power, and says he fears that if Trump does not cooperate, the country could be vulnerable to an attack
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: David Plouffe calls Trump delaying transition ‘the most reckless and irresponsible thing he’s ever done’
description: Former Obama campaign manager David Plouffe says we are paying the price for Donald Trump’s ego with his refusal to concede, which is hindering the government’s response to coronavirus
source.name: MSNBC
